XXnagbhc_u:6: kuṇapaḥ kāminī bhakṣya iti tisro vikalpanāḥ // NagBhc_20 ...
XXnagbhc_u:11: cittamātram idaṃ sarvam iti yā deśanā muneḥ /
XXnagbhc_u:15: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhir na vidyate // NagBhc_45
XXnagbhc_u:17: ākāśaṃ bodhicittaṃ ca bodhir advayalakṣaṇā // NagBhc_46 ...
XXnagbhc_u:21: guḍe madhuratā cāgner uṣṇatvaṃ prakṛtir yathā /
XXnagbhc_u:22: śūnyatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathā prakṛtir iṣyate // NagBhc_57 ...
XXnagbhc_u:25: bhidyante bahudhā loka upāyair bahubhiḥ punaḥ // NagBhc_98
